downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2, 2012, and 2009 white paper: Dutch SBR and Digipoort support
downloadDescription: This white paper provides information about SBR and Digipoort support for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2, 2012, and 2009.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft Dynamics AX Dutch SBR and Digipoort support.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/b/4/e/b4e0f098-3acf-49eb-a155-e1df52667dee/Microsoft Dynamics AX Dutch SBR and Digipoort support.pdf

detailsSection: This white paper provides information about the Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 R2, 2012, and 2009 country-specific update for Netherlands that is related to the submission of VAT and ICP declarations in XBRL format via Digipoort services.
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft Dynamics AX Dutch SBR and Digipoort support.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
